modInfo.name: Bookworm
modInfo.description:
# Bookworm

An inventory convenience for reading many things in succession.

This is probably more useful if you also have a fast-reading
mod, but you do you.
Fast reading mods:

[Cat's Faster Reading Mod](https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2690908199)
[Cat's Faster Reading Mod (Slower)](https: //steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2694816684)
